mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.no, a.createDate, a.title, a.body, u.loginId, userId, u.name, b.boardName, b.id as boardId FROM article a INNER JOIN user u ON a.userId = u.id INNER JOIN board b ON a.boardId = b.id WHERE a.id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (`no`, createDate, modifiedDate, title, body, userId, boardId) VALUES (#{no}, now(), now(), #{title}, #{body}, #{userId}, #{boardId})
